text: some are lucky these two babies wrapped
up and passed carefully to safety but
many are still missing between the walls
of at least four buildings that have
come down it was about 4 a.m. and I woke
up with a start like the entire building
was just shaking very violently it was
quite loud and I honestly couldn't tell
you how long it lasted it just I just
remember thinking please be done please
be done I have two young children and
one was in the next room and we could
hear her calling out to us but it was
shaking too hard for us to get up the
earthquake struck close to the southern
city of Tainan on the small island of
Taiwan east of China woman so no date
the current situation of this disaster
isn't all clear but continuing to
communicate with those on the ground
several aftershocks have already
followed with fears there are more to
come in this area which is often hit by
earthquakes in 1999 a 7.6 magnitude
quake killed thousands but while workers
locates more survivors in these mangled
ruins the extent of the devastation is
still unfolding
